item.title: Django Metrics, Logs & Traces Observability with Opentelemetry and Grafana
item.description: Metrics, Logs and Traces (MLT) are the three pillars of observability that can provide us with complete visibility of a software system. In this article, we’re going to set up a system where MLT data is collected from a hello-world microservice application.

item.title: Monitor Kubernetes Apps through Metrics, Logs and Traces (MLT)
item.description: Metrics, Logs and Traces (MLT) are the three pillars of monitoring that can give us complete observability of a system. In this article, we’re going to set up all three of MLT on a Kubernetes platform to monitor an app made with microservices.
